Name: Go-Kart Racing
About the game: Go-Kart Racing provides racers with a thrilling go-kart racing experience. Compete against drivers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest! Experience high speeds, big karting crashes, and exhilaration as you battle your way through the pack and compete for victory. FEATURES Race against 23 other AI Drivers out on the track. Race on 3 challenging Go-Kart race tracks. Customize your Go-Kart Paint Scheme. Earn Steam Achievements as you complete races. Compete on the Steam Leaderboards to earn the best finish. QUICK RACES Customize the length of your own races on three different racetracks. Compete in quick races to practice and improve your speed. COMPETITIVE AI RACING AI Drivers will compete on the racetrack and look for the best opportunities to pass each other during each race event. At each event, some AI Drivers may have more competitive cars depending on their performance. PS4 Controller (Dualshock 4) is recommended for the greatest driving experience.
